name: Risen Rift
description:
Risen Rift

Welcome to Risen Rift, a local multiplayer game inspired by the theme "An end is a new beginning"! In this action-packed game, you and your friends can battle it out. Be careful, as death is not the end. In fact, every time you die, you'll come back stronger with a better weapon. But don't get too comfortable, if you die too many times, it's game over. With thrilling gameplay and exciting new features, Risen Rift is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat. Download now and see if you have what it takes to rise from the ashes and come out on top!

Controls

AD/left stick to move

Space/button south to jump

Left click/button east to shoot

Why?

This game is part of the 2023  Brackeys Game Jam, where the theme was 

An End is a new Beginning.

Tips and Tricks

With the Sniper you are able to shoot trough walls.

Requirements
  • At least 1 controller.
  • A Pc with windows
  • A Friend

 

Install
  • Un-zip the file.
  • Open "RisenRift.exe"
  • Enjoy
